title: RIOT SCAM- WATCH YOUR RP MONEY
body: Riot has been looking for accounts with Hundreds of dollars Spent like mine, and will BAN it for Any reason whats so ever to Make you have to spend ALL Your Money Again. Do not fall for it, it doesnt matter if the bans are 5 years from now like mine. at Some point they will Take your account and Take ALL OF YOUR MONEY. BEWARE- guys PLAY FOR FREE
